entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:23 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 08:23 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5 except temperature steady near plus 2 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
